description: Hi, Can someone add a metadata property to attach gpu as a main display source in a instance?
title: gpu as main display source

comments.content: Hi, Can someone add a metadata property to attach gpu as a main display source in a instance?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~oxkipo

comments.content:
This isn't a bug, this is more like a feature request. If you're wondering about getting something like this added to nova, and want to start a discussion, I'd suggest bringing it up in the openstack-dev mailing list:

http://lists.openstack.org/cgi-bin/mailman/listinfo/openstack-dev

Tag the subject with [nova] so it's filtered properly.

You could also mention this in the open discussion section of the weekly nova meeting:

http://eavesdrop.openstack.org/#Nova_Team_Meeting
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
